fi.ak.dungeongen.logic

Class Location

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.ak.dungeongen.logic.Location

  • public class Location
extends Object
    Class provides location as a column/row coordinate. Other classes use this class as instead of a x/y coordinate to know where they are located in the two dimensional level.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Location(int row, int col)
      Constructor for creating Location objects from row/column coordinate.
      Location(Location location)
      Constructor for copying Location objects.
